roleset.name: put together in a chunk
roleset.note: CHUNK-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire. (from chunk.01-v)

role.descr: chunk itself, group arg1 is chunked into

example.name: Rags made dress
example.text: She then touched Cinderella's rags and [they]-1 were chunked *-1 into a beautiful dress.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In order to import all of the contacts, they chunked them into 26 files containing 5000 records each.
example.arg: In order to import all of the contacts
